channel.title: Help With Mysql
channel.description:
Okay i'm real close to getting my server running on mysql. I'm using FlashFXP to connect, but having trouble on what information to put in when i click quick connect.
Really help if you had msn =) Anyone that helps me i'll be so grateful i'll post a pic.
[IMG]http://www.imagehosting.com/out.php/i1171957_pic123.bmp[/img]
I've added some codes to myserver so it converts into mysql. And have an account on fr33webhost, and created a mysql database. Has anyone done this before?

item.title: Help With Mysql
item.dc:creator: @Coder_X Coder X
item.description:
@Coder_X wrote:

I almost had it connected, but it unconnects. Can someone contact me that knows how to use FlashFXP?

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Mysql

item.description:
@Coder_X wrote:

BTW make more sence when your writing[/quote]
